Name: M 125 - Erasmus Ikpemgbe, Landmarks Preservation Commission
Title: RESOLUTION APPROVING THE APPOINTMENT BY THE MAYOR OF ERASMUS IKPEMGBE AS A COMMISSIONER OF THE NEW YORK CITY LANDMARKS PRESERVATION COMMISSION.
BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
History.BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Text:
RESOLVED, Pursuant to Sections 31 and 3020 of the New York City Charter, the Council hereby approves the appointment by the Mayor of Erasmus Ikpemgbe as a commissioner of the New York City Landmarks Preservation Commission to serve for the remainder of a three-year term that will expire on June 28, 2027.

COUPLED ON GO
